name: Paint It White!
description:
An Endless Runner where you need to paint red stuff with white paint and basically renew anything red into white.

A game made in 7 days for the Hackingtons Game Jam

Special Thanks & Credits To:

Freesound - "Sword Swing B - Medium 07.wav" by Glaneur de sons

Freesound - "Game_over.wav" by deleted_user_877451

Freesound - "Explosion, 8-bit, 01.wav" by InspectorJ

Freesound - "Wet Splat" by JustInvoke

Freesound - "Bamboo Swing, A13.wav" by InspectorJ

.
